00042 unsigned int
00043 GrLightSet::GetLightCount() const
00044 {
00045         return ( unsigned int )_lights.size();
00046 }

00048 //----------------------------------------------------------
00049 URef< GrLight >
00050 GrLightSet::GetLight( unsigned int idx ) const
00051 {
00052         return _lights[ idx ];

00055 //----------------------------------------------------------
00056 void
00057 GrLightSet::AddLight( URef< GrLight > light )
00058 {
00060         unsigned int lightCount = GetLightCount();
00061         for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < lightCount; ++i )
00062         {
00063                 if ( _lights[ i ] == light )
00064                         return;
00065         }
00066 
00068         _lights.push_back( light );
00069 }
00070 
00071 //----------------------------------------------------------
00072 URef< GrLight >
00073 GrLightSet::FindLight( const char* name, int cmpLen ) const
00074 {
00076         unsigned int idx = FindLightIdx( name, cmpLen );
00077 
00079         if ( idx == ~0 )
00080                 return 0;
00081 
00083         return _lights[ idx ];
00084 }
00085 
00086 //----------------------------------------------------------
00087 bool
00088 GrLightSet::RemoveLight( const char* name )
00089 {
00091         unsigned int idx = FindLightIdx( name );
00092 
00094         if ( idx == ~0 )
00095                 return false;
00096 
00098         _lights.erase( _lights.begin() + idx );
00099         return true;
00100 }
00101 
00102 //----------------------------------------------------------
00103 bool
00104 GrLightSet::RemoveLight( GrLight* light )
00105 {
00107         unsigned int idx = FindLightIdx( light->GetId().GetPathString().c_str() );
00108 
00110         if ( idx == ~0 )
00111                 return false;
00112 
00116         B_ASSERT( _lights[ idx ] == light );
00117 
00119         _lights.erase( _lights.begin() + idx );
00120         return true;
00121 }

00124 void
00125 GrLightSet::Clear()
00126 {
00127         _lights.clear();
00128 }

00134 //----------------------------------------------------------
00135 unsigned int
00136 GrLightSet::FindLightIdx( const char* name, int cmpLen ) const
00137 {
00139         unsigned int lightCount = GetLightCount();
00140         if ( cmpLen < 0 )
00141         {
00142                 for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < lightCount; ++i )
00143                 {
00144                         if ( _stricmp( _lights[ i ]->GetId().GetPathString().c_str(), name ) == 0 )
00145                                 return i;
00146                 }
00147         }
00148         else
00149         {
00150                 for ( unsigned int i = 0; i < lightCount; ++i )
00151                 {
00152                         if ( _strnicmp( _lights[ i ]->GetId().GetPathString().c_str(), name, cmpLen ) == 0 )
00153                                 return i;
00154                 }
00155         }
00156 
00158         return ~0;
00159 }
